resources.string: Let`s begin with connect your watch
A Modern and User-friendly Toolbox for Android-WearOS devices
" \n Please check the screen of your device and authorize the connection."
Web Browser is not found on your device.
Please grant storage permission in Settings.
Hello, new guy! We strongly recommended to read the \"Help Center\" before use it. Have a nice time!

In order for the function to work properly, we need to request the following permissions from your system:

1. Storage Permissions:
 "Select APK File" in "Install APK" function and "Upload/Download File" in "File Manager" need to visit your storage directory .
Needless to say, we need more WearOS devices and Web servers for better services.
We cannot help, unless we have that device to debug and test. Besides, several planned functions, including an internal AppStore which needs low-latency and fast web servers.
For financial support, please consider to donate via Alipay and WeChat Pay.
It seems that you have not installed Alipay.
QR code saved in /sdcard/Pictures/Wearosbox. What about to launch WeChat?
It seems that you have not installed Wechat.
Failed to login: Verify your Email first.

"Considering to donate us. Minimal amount is 1.99$. Please enter your Email in remarks column.\nContact us if your account is not upgraded automatically in 24 hours. Telegram at "
Sorry, this feature requires upgraded version. For more details, please check \"Donate Us\" page.

Do you want to display the application name? The application name is not displayed by default, please click \"OK\" if necessary.\n\nDisplay the application name list will extend loading time (Triple time than disabled - package name only)
Can\'t verify APK\'s signature, it may corrupted.
Device\'s Android version is too low to install the APK.
Your device\'s cpu architecture do not supported the APK.
Your device not allowed to sideloading apps.
File name includes special characters symbols, please change the apk name.
Android OS is missing required shared library.
Selected file is not a valid APK file.
System Internal Error, please try again later.
Test-Only APK. Please install it by in-app terminal with command\nadb install -t\nor Release the APK.

No route to host: If the IP address is correct, it usually caused by your router or your phone. Following ways may solve the problem.
1. Check your device's IP address (in most cases)
2. Restart your wireless router, phone and watch.
3. Connect to your watch with another Wi-Fi or hotspot
4. Disable AP Isolation.
5. Change another ADB Binary version.
ADB binary is missing. Failed to connect to your device.\\n Please contact to developers.
Connection timed out. Please check IP address and network between devices.
Connection refused. Please enable ADB Debug in Developer settings or try again later.
Current ADB Binary version is not available on your OS. Pleases change it on Settings.\nAlso try to force stop WearOS Toolbox, especially having changed ADB version.
IP address is invalid. Check if there is a typo in it.
Please clear the data or switch the ADB version in the upper right corner
Upload failed.\nSome files was skipped by your OS.
Q4: Connect status always offline but cannot grant debug permission?
Please switch to another ADB version in App Settings and restart your watch.
Download failed.\nSome files was skipped by your OS.
Username or pwd cannot be empty.
Reboot to take effort. Plus, it\'s not available on Huawei devices bucause it will cause UI bugs.

WearOS Toolbox Software License Agreement

This Software License Agreement (Hereinafter referred to as the "Agreement") is a legal agreement between you and Flyfish Studio (hereinafter referred to as "us") regarding the WearOS Toolbox (hereinafter referred to as the "Software").
 This Agreement describes the rights and obligations between us and you regarding the licensed use of the Software and related aspects. Please be sure to read carefully, fully understand the contents of each clause, and choose to accept or not to accept (minors should be accompanied by legal guardians to review).
 Unless you accept the terms of this Agreement, you have no right to download, install or use this software and its related services. Your installation and use will be regarded as acceptance of this Agreement, and you agree to be bound by the terms of this Agreement.

【About this software】
 This software is a tool software developed by us based on the Android platform that provides functions such as modifying some system parameters, installing user applications, and transferring files for smart watches based on WearOS or Android operating systems.

【About system settings modification function】
(1) Before using this software to modify system settings/parameters (such as screen resolution, DPI), users must fully understand the specific functions of relevant parameters and the specific consequences of improper modification, and have the corresponding problem-solving ability. If you modify the parameters by yourself and cause the device to be abnormal (including but not limited to being unable to boot, restarting repeatedly, abnormal display, etc.), we will not be responsible for it.
(2) Before using this software to modify parameters, users must first understand the warranty policy of their own equipment.

【About the application library】
(1) This software provides third-party application download and installation functions for users who have registered accounts. After users recognize and accept this agreement, they can install third-party applications for their devices according to their own needs.
(2) Affected by factors such as system version, we do not guarantee that all applications can run normally on user devices.
(3) All applications on the platform are uploaded to the platform after corresponding tests. However, due to uncertain factors, we do not assume any responsibility for equipment damage caused by installing and upgrading third-party applications.
(4) Most of the applications in the platform have been authorized by the developers and uploaded by the developers themselves. However, there are still some applications that have not been authorized for the time being due to the inability to contact the developer/developer, and the developers of these applications have the right to apply for the removal of the corresponding application if they can provide us with valid identification.

【About account and donation version】
(1) This software provides a user registration channel. After recognizing and accepting this agreement, the user has the right to choose an account and email address that has not been used by other users, and set a password that meets the security requirements. The account, email and password set by the user are the credentials used by the user to log in to the software.
(2) Users can register accounts and activate the donation function through various existing and future new channels.
(3) The registered account on this software is limited to the registered user's own use, and it is prohibited to donate, borrow, rent, transfer or sell. If we find or have reason to suspect that the user is not the initial registrant of the account, we have the right to suspend or terminate the service provided to the user without notice, and have the right to cancel the account without being liable to the account user. responsibility, and all losses arising therefrom shall be borne by the user.
(4) Before users activate the donation version, please confirm that they are over 16 years old. If they are under 16 years old, please pay for activation after the legal guardian's permission. If the user sends the paid acquisition behavior, it is deemed that the user has reached the age of 16.

【User Prohibited Behavior】
 Unless permitted by law or with our written permission, you must not:
(1) Delete the copyright information on this software and its copies.
(2) Reverse engineer, disassemble, decompile the software, or try to discover the source code of the software in other ways.
(3) Publicly disseminate the login account and password of the paid-for donation service in this software.
(4) Copy, modify, add or delete the software or the data released into the memory of any terminal during the running of the software, the interactive data between the client and the server during the running of the software, and the system data necessary for the running of the software , hook operation or create any derivative works, including but not limited to the use of plug-ins, plug-ins or third-party tools/services not authorized by us to access the software and related systems.
(5) By modifying or falsifying the instructions and data in the operation of the software, adding, deleting, changing the functions or operating effects of the software, or operating or disseminating the software and methods used for the above-mentioned purposes to the public, regardless of whether these acts are commercial purposes.
(6) Log in or use the software and services, or create, publish, and disseminate the above tools through third-party software, plug-ins, plug-ins, and systems not developed and authorized by us.
(7) Interfere with this software and its components, modules, data, etc. by yourself, authorize others or use third-party software.

【Legal Responsibility and Disclaimer】
(1) If the user violates the provisions of this agreement or the relevant terms of service, we have the right to take measures including but not limited to interrupting the license, stopping the provision of services, restricting the use, and pursuing legal investigations, depending on the nature of the user's behavior. At the same time, we will assist in the investigation at the request of the judicial department.
(2) If the user violates the agreement and causes any third party damage, the user shall be solely responsible; if we suffer losses due to this, the user shall also compensate.
(3) The use of this software involves Internet service factors and may be affected by unstable factors in various links, such as force majeure, computer virus, hacker attack, system instability, user location, user shutdown, and any other network, technology, The user must understand and bear the risk of service interruption or failure to meet user requirements caused by communication lines and other reasons. To the maximum extent permitted by applicable law, under no circumstances shall we be liable for any special, incidental, indirect or indirect damages arising out of the use or inability to use this software, even if the user has notified us in advance the likelihood of such damage occurring.
(4) We are not responsible for the economic losses suffered by users due to communication line failures, technical problems, network, computer or mobile phone failures, system instability and other force majeure reasons of third parties such as telecommunications departments.
(5) If the normal operation of the service is affected by a force majeure event, we promise to cooperate with the relevant units to repair it in a timely manner, but we are not responsible for the economic loss suffered by the user.
(6) You must fully understand the purpose and risks of using this software. When necessary, our liability is limited to software version upgrades.

【Other Conditions】
(1) The authorization agreement in the form of electronic text is the same as the agreement signed by both parties in writing, and has full and equivalent legal effect. Your use of this software or this service is deemed to have read and agreed to be bound by this agreement. Behavior beyond the scope of the agreement will directly violate this license agreement and constitute infringement. We have the right to terminate the authorization at any time, order to stop the damage, and reserve the right to pursue relevant responsibilities.
(2) We have the right to amend the terms of this agreement when necessary. You can review the terms of the relevant agreement in the latest version of the software. After the terms of this agreement are changed, if you continue to use the software, you are deemed to have accepted the revised agreement. If you do not accept the revised agreement, you should stop using the software.
(3) The terms of this agreement are partially invalid or unenforceable for whatever reason, the remaining terms are still valid and binding on both parties.
(4) The titles of all clauses in this agreement are for reading convenience only, have no actual meaning in themselves, and cannot be used as the basis for the interpretation of the meaning of this agreement.
(5) We reserve the right of final interpretation of this agreement.

Protocol Version: 1.0
Agreement Renewal Date: December 4, 2021
Agreement Effective Date: December 4, 2021

I agree to the above user agreement
I agree to the above privacy policy
Please agree with the privacy policy.

Flyfish Studio does its best to protect the privacy of every user

1. Who are we?
We are Flyfish Studio, the development team for the WearOS toolbox.

2. What and why do we collect personal data?
1. Statistics (for web pages and help center):
We use Microsoft(TM) Clarity to count the website content you visit, understand user preferences and popular pages, and analyze and optimize the WearOS Toolbox official website.
Statistics are completely anonymous, and the WearOS Toolkit website does not ask you to enter any data.
If you need Do Not Track, you can use ADBlock Plus or other ad blocking tools that come with your browser to block the statistics page by yourself.
Upon completion, you will automatically exit the Privacy Agreement.
2. Statistics (for WearOS Toolbox app library):
Analysis of app downloads.
We use accounts to analyze your data. The Privacy Policy will take effect when you create an account.
The download volume is completely anonymous and displayed in real time on the interface of your corresponding downloaded app in the application library. The rest have no data.
If you are not allowed to provide any data, you can apply for cancellation of your account, which will be stopped immediately.
After the account cancellation is completed, you will automatically withdraw from the privacy agreement.

3. How long do we keep your information?
1. Statistics (for WearOS Toolbox website): We periodically process and archive out-of-date statistics.
2. Statistics (applicable to WearOS Toolbox App Library): When the app you downloaded is removed by the App Library; when you request to cancel the download statistics of your account, we will delete it immediately.
3. User Information (for WearOS Toolbox App): For registered users of this app, we also save the personal information provided by the user in their profile. Your information includes: registration date, email account, user name, developer permission, and donation user. No one except administrators can view your data.

4. What rights do you have over your information?
If you have registered an account, you can delete it by contacting us. This does not include data that we must retain due to administrative, regulatory or security needs.

5. Where do we send your information?
Your data will not be disclosed except as required by the law enforcement government in the user's place of residence.

6. How do we protect your data?
We will take appropriate security measures to protect database data and web page data. We will not disclose any of your data to any third-party platform/organization without your permission.
WearOS Toolbox uses specialized cloud storage services to store data to maximize data security.

7. Industry Regulatory Disclosure Requirements
Comply with the "Constitution of the People's Republic of China" and related regulations, especially, subject to supervision.

Privacy Policy Version: 1.2
Privacy Policy Update Date: September 2, 2022
Privacy Policy Effective Date: September 2, 2022

Other Android devices, including your Android Phone and Auto

Your device may not work with this app. Give it a try on your own.

Please sure your device is based on Android, "Developer Option" and WLAN are available on your device.

Google "how to enable developer options" with your device, then enable ADB Over WLAN manually with adb.wearosbox.com
Please sure \"Developer Option\" and WLAN are available on your device.\nEnable ADB Over WLAN manually with adb.wearosbox.com and connect to your device.
All done. \nTry out all the convenience of WearOS Toolbox by connecting your device right now!

WearOS Devices can directly connect to your phone with "ADB Over WLAN" option.

For Huawei Watch user: Please enable Huawei Mode on settings for best experience, including APK install.
Bluetooth ADB Tutorial is available on Help Center.
Please choose your device type first

Due to WeChat restrictions, donating by scanning the QR code through WeChat is not currently supported. Please pay attention to the WearOS Toolbox official account first, then click \"WeChat Donation\" in the menu bar of the official account, and press and hold the second button to scan the reply. QR code to pay. Next, save the \"WearOS Toolbox\" WeChat official account QR code, click \"Confirm\" to continue.

Device rejected your operation.

For Huawei Watch 3 devices: Be sure you have enabled Huawei Mode.
For other devices: Try to change another APK install mode on preference.
ADB Service was killed by your system, \nDue to a modified LMK (Low Memory Killer) by your phone vendor.\nTry enable ADB Daemon on settings or retry.
Please log in your device manually in Funtions > Terminal with \'adb auth <password>\'.
Your device does not need to use this feature.
If you have a bug or an idea, talk with us on GitHub
Send crash reports and usage stats to us to improve perfermance and features. It won\'t be used to identify you, check it on Know Your Data.
We won\'t collect any diagnostic or usage stats.
Check out what we collect when Send Diagnostic Information is enabled.
